title: Predictive Strategy Design for Mathematics Achievement Using Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics knowledge and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A course investigating personalized math curriculum design for working professionals, applying learning analytics to predict individual academic achievement

learning_goals: Learners can build an academic achievement prediction model by analyzing learning activity data (online task engagement, discussion forum activity).
Learners can identify and evaluate effective learning prediction indicators in a blended problem-based learning environment.
Learners can establish personalized instructional strategies by visualizing individual engagement patterns in the mathematics learning process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
